HomePage.role: Website Developer | Business Enthusiast | Social-Humanity Researcher
HomePage.resume: A final-year student in the Information Systems program at Airlangga University, with experience as an activist and leader in various campus organizations, Founder and CEO of (1) apparel business & (2) digital startup, and currently serving as a lecturerâ€™s research assistant under a five-year freelance work contract for the development of the MIKA Education website at the East Java Autism Care Forum, a project funded by the Australian Direct Aid Program in 2023. Motivated to build a career in Human Resources Information Systems (HRIS), Research & Development, and IT Governance, supported by the integration of technical skills in information system-based product development with managerial capabilities in HR/IT. This interest is further reinforced through continuous self-development, such as earning a Full-stack Web Development certification under the MSIB Batch 6 program by Kemenristek in 2024, a Leadership and Management certification through LKMM by Kemenristek and LT by the departmental student association, and a Business Development & Management certification from the AYE 2024 program by DPKKA UNAIR.

services.title: Open To Work
services.sub_title: I am open to work offers as a permanent employee, and am ready to implement technical, managerial and leadership experience with a high learning spirit to contribute maximally in the world of work.

cta.title: Let's work together!

resume.paragraf_1: Hello there! Thank you for visiting my personal website. I'm Ahmad Rayhan, An Information Systems student at Universitas Airlangga with over 4 years of experience in the field of technology and information systems. I have consistently demonstrated commitment and dedication in achieving accomplishments while developing competencies in information technology, entrepreneurship, and leadership.
resume.paragraf_2: Academic experience includes working as a freelancer on various website development projects for academic research purposesâ€”both for lecturers and studentsâ€”as well as for business owners. These projects have ranged from frontend tasks such as building landing pages and company profiles, to full-stack development including learning platforms, dashboards, and service-based sales systems. One of the major milestones in my academic and professional journey was my involvement in the development of MIKA Education, an autism education platform, where I served as a project assistant and lead developer. The platform was successfully funded by the Australian Direct Aid Program through the Australian Consulate-General in 2023. Additionally, I actively contribute as an international researcher at the East Java Autism Care Forum, combining technology, research, and direct social impact.
resume.paragraf_3: My interest in business development and management has led to the establishment of two legally registered businesses. The first is Entative Hub, a digital agency platform based on the gig economy model that connects student freelancers with digital service requests from business owners. The second is Roxoon Apparel, a clothing and merchandise business developed since 2023 using an outsourcing system and third-party production vendors, which has generated an annual revenue of up to IDR 100 million. Alongside the development of both businesses, my skills in digital marketing and graphic design have also grownâ€”particularly in crafting business strategies, concepts, and visual identities such as logos/brandmarks, media content, infographics, and visual company profiles. These achievements are further supported by my selection as an awardee of the Airlangga Youth Entrepreneurship (AYE) 2024 program by the Directorate of Career Development, Entrepreneurship Incubation, and Alumni at Universitas Airlangga.
resume.paragraf_4: A balance of experience and leadership is demonstrated through various strategic roles in student organizationsâ€”from team leader during freshman orientation, field coordinator in community service programs, head of department-level benchmarking events, chief executive of a faculty-level village development program, to core management staff in the Student Executive Board (BEM) at the faculty level. In addition, I have earned both national and international recognitions, including a Silver Medal in the 2023 LIP3D program (Village Innovation Development Competition) for a green economy-based village digitalization initiative, selected as an awardee in the MSIB Batch 6 program as a Full-Stack Web Developer by the Ministry of Education and Culture in 2024, Best Presenter at ICAPH 2024â€”an international conference on inclusive product development, and selected participant in the International Student Mobility Program to Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia (UKM) in 2024. Most notably, I was honored with a Silver Medal at the IPITEx 2024â€”the International Intellectual Property, Invention, Innovation and Technology Exhibition in Bangkok, hosted by Thailandâ€™s National Research Council (NRCT).
resume.paragraf_5: With a combination of technical expertise, managerial capabilities, leadership qualities, and a strong passion for learning, I am fully prepared to contribute meaningfully to the professional world.

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Worked as a researcher by collecting data, conducting literature reviews, and analyzing technical requirements for the development of the MIKA platform in collaboration with academics, practitioners, and autism therapists.
responsibilities.responsibility_2: Developed the MIKA web platform with micro-credential learning content, including UI/UX design, architectural diagrams, database modeling, prototyping, and full-stack code implementation.
responsibilities.responsibility_3: Presented protocol studies at national and international levels to promote MIKA platform products during exhibitions and workshop events.

responsibilities.responsibility_1: As founder and chief executive responsible for decision-making, vision-mission, external relations, resource management, internalization and strategic direction of the platform to community empowerment.
responsibilities.responsibility_2: Operating as a student-only freelance platform that to date has completed over 20++ creative digital service requests from clients.
responsibilities.responsibility_3: Offers services in more than 10++ digital agency products, covering the categories of creative production, visual & graphic design, to digital marketing.

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Developed a custom convection and merchandise business based on customer requests for uniforms or needs from events, committees, organizations, institutions to companies.

responsibilities.responsibility_3: Successfully completed more than 100 orders with an estimated turnover of 100 million/year.

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Become a Project Manager (PM) in developing a dashboard & one stop shop website platform.

responsibilities.responsibility_3: Able to learn full stack website development with 50 other students from various institutions.
